ticket.title: Date, DateTime, Time not playing nice with #.day, #hour, etc.
ticket.original-body:
On Rails 2.3.3, Ruby 1.8.7
I'm pretty sure this used to work in Rails 2.3.2 (we started getting lots of errors related to this kind of thing after upping to 2.3.3)
These should all add one day Date.today + 1.day DateTime.now + 1.day Time.now + 1.day
These DO all add one month Date.today + 1.month DateTime.now + 1.month Time.now + 1.month
These should add one hour DateTime.now + 1.hour Time.now + 1.hour
